mdRecord.dcterms:title: Black and White Negatives of a Man in Uniform
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white negatives of a man in a uniform, one pair of negatives where he is standing in front of a house, another pair of negatives where the man is using a Bel-Air car phone, and the envelope they were contained in, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
